Aircraft_Class.aircraft_class module¶

class Aircraft_Class.aircraft_class.Aircraft[source]¶

Bases: object

Class used as a container for aircraft computation - Parasitic drag

Class used as a container for all body/fuselage information (taken from input file) - Translate and scale fuselage - Volume

Class used as a container for all propulsion information (taken from input file) - Thrust curve - Battery # of cell - Mass - Propeller properties (diameter and pitch)

Aircraft_Class.gen_files module¶

Aircraft_Class.gen_files.genGeo(AC)[source]¶

genGeo: Generates AVL geometry file

Inputs:
AC: Airctaft with attributes: Sref, MAC, b_wing, cg, CDp, Xle, … Yle, C, Xle_t, Yle_t, C_t
Outputs:
None, just “outs” the AVL geometry file
Aircraft_Class.gen_files.genMass(AC)[source]¶

gen_mass: Generates AVL mass file

Inputs:
AC: Aircraft with all current attributes
Outputs:
None, just “outs” the mass file
